SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.rmi

Interface UnicastRemoteObjects.TrackingExporter

All Superinterfaces:
UnicastRemoteObjects.Exporter
Enclosing class:
UnicastRemoteObjects
public static interface UnicastRemoteObjects.TrackingExporter extends UnicastRemoteObjects.Exporter
Interface used to export remote objects which also tracks which object have been exported and allows bulk-unexporting them

    export

  • Method Details

    • getUnderlyingExporter

      UnicastRemoteObjects.Exporter getUnderlyingExporter()
      Returns the underlying exporter used to actually export objects

    • export

      <T extends Remote> T export(T obj, int port, boolean track) throws RemoteException
      Exports the remote object to make it available to receive incoming calls, using the particular supplied port. Optionally, the object can also be excluded from tracking and, therefore, from bulk-unregistering

      The object is exported using settings provided when creating this exporter.

      Parameters:
      obj - the remote object to be exported
      port - the port to export the object on
      track - whether the object needs to be tracked or not
      Returns:
      remote object stub
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if export fails

    • unexportAll

      void unexportAll(boolean force)
      Unexport all objects previously exported with tracking by this exporter
      Parameters:
      force - if true, unexports the object even if there are pending or in-progress calls; if false, only unexports the object if there are no pending or in-progress calls
      See Also:
      • UnicastRemoteObject.unexportObject(Remote, boolean)
